plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe namagama angu-%d.
Iphasiwedi okungenani kumele ibe negama elingu-1

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Iphasiwedi kumele ibe okungenani namagama ezinhlamvu ezingafelebisiwe ze-%d
Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe negama lombhalo elingafelebisiwe elingu-1

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani namagama ofeleba e-%d.
Iphasiwedi kumele ibe okungenani negama lofeleba olungu-1

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Iphasiwedi kumele ibe okungenani amadijithi ezinombolo angu-%d.
Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe nedijithi yenombolo engu-1

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Iphasiwedi kumele ibe nezinhlamvu ezikhethekile ezingu-%d.
Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe nohlamvu olukhethekile olungu-1.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe nezinhlamvu ezingewona amagama ezingu-%d.
Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe nohlamvu olungelona igama olungu-1
